 24462                                  
 24463                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24464 0000425E 36A0[6B05]              	MOV	AL,[ss:ATTRIB]		; AL <- SearchSet
 24465 00004262 F6D0                    	NOT	AL			; AL <- SearchSet'
 24466 00004264 20E8                    	AND	AL,CH			; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet
 24467                                  	;and	al,16h
 24468 00004266 2416                    	AND	AL,attr_all	; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet and Important
 24469                                  ;
 24470                                  ; the result is non-zero if an attribute is not in the search set
 24471                                  ; and in the found set and in the important set. This means that we do not
 24472                                  ; have a match. Do a JNZ <nomatch> or JZ <match>
 24473                                  ;
 24474 00004268 58                      	POP	AX
 24475 00004269 C3                      	retn

 24483                                  ;Break <DevName - Look for name of device>
 24484                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24485                                  ;
 24486                                  ; Procedure Name : DevName
 24487                                  ;
 24488                                  ; Inputs:
 24489                                  ;	DS,ES:DOSDATA
 24490                                  ;	Filename in NAME1
 24491                                  ;	ATTRIB set so that we can error out if looking for Volume IDs
 24492                                  ; Function:
 24493                                  ;	Determine if file is in list of I/O drivers
 24494                                  ; Outputs:
 24495                                  ;	Carry set if not a device
 24496                                  ;	ELSE
 24497                                  ;	Zero flag set
 24498                                  ;	BH = Bit 7,6 = 1, bit 5 = 0 (cooked mode)
 24499                                  ;	     bits 0-4 set from low byte of attribute word
 24500                                  ;	DEVPT = DWORD pointer to Device header of device
 24501                                  ; BX destroyed, others preserved
 24502                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24503                                  
 24504                                  DEVNAME:

 24533                                  	;TEST	word [SI+SYSDEV.ATT],DEVTYP

 24535 0000428E 89F0                    	MOV	AX,SI

 24573                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 24574                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24575                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 24576                                  ;
 24577                                  ; Inputs:
 24578                                  ;	[NAME1] has name
 24579                                  ;	BH is attribute field (supplied by DEVNAME)
 24580                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 24581                                  ; Function:
 24582                                  ;	Build a directory entry for a device at DEVFCB
 24583                                  ; Outputs:
 24584                                  ;	BX points to DEVFCB
 24585                                  ;	SI points to dir_first field
 24586                                  ;	AH = input BH
 24587                                  ;	AL = 0
 24588                                  ;	dir_first = DEVPT
 24589                                  ;	Zero Set, Carry Clear
 24590                                  ; DS,ES,BP preserved, others destroyed
 24591                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24592                                  
 24593                                  Build_device_ent:
 24594 000042C9 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 24595                                  
 24596                                  ;hkn; DEVFCB is in DOSDATA

 24598                                  
 24599                                  ;	Fill dir_ext	BUGBUG - use ERRNZs for this stuff!
 24600                                  
 24601 000042CF AB                      	STOSW
 24602 000042D0 AA                      	STOSB				; Blank out extent field

 24604 000042D1 B040                    	MOV	AL,attr_device
 24605                                  
 24606                                  ;	Fill Dir_attr
 24607                                  
 24608 000042D3 AA                      	STOSB				; Set attribute field

 24610 000042D6 B90A00                  	MOV	CX,10
 24611                                  
 24612                                  ; Fill dir_pad

 24615 000042DB E868C8                  	call	DATE16
 24616                                  
 24617                                  ;hkn; DEVFCB is in DOSDATA

 24619 000042E1 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 24620                                  
 24621                                  ; Fill dir_time
 24622                                  
 24623 000042E2 AB                      	STOSW
 24624 000042E3 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 24625                                  
 24626                                  ; Fill dir_date
 24627                                  
 24628 000042E4 AB                      	STOSW
 24629 000042E5 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI			; SI points to dir_first field
 24630 000042E7 A1[9A05]                	MOV	AX,[DEVPT]
 24631                                  
 24632                                  ; Fill dir_first
 24633                                  
 24634 000042EA AB                      	STOSW				; Dir_first points to device
 24635 000042EB A1[9C05]                	MOV	AX,[DEVPT+2]
 24636                                  ;
 24637                                  ; Fill dir_size_l
 24638                                  ;

 24640 000042EF 88FC                    	MOV	AH,BH			; Put device atts in AH

 24643 000042F1 BB[4B05]                	MOV	BX,DEVFCB

 24811                                  ; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24812                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - offset 43BDh
 24813                                  
 24814                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 24815                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24816                                  ;
 24817                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 24818                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 24819                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 24820                                  ;
 24821                                  ;	[path]device
 24822                                  ;
 24823                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 24824                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 24825                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 24826                                  ;
 24827                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 24828                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 24829                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 24830                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 24831                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 24832                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 24833                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 24834                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24835                                  
 24836                                  CheckThisDevice:
 24837 000043B3 57                      	push	di
 24838 000043B4 56                      	push	si
 24839 000043B5 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 24840                                  
 24841                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 24842                                  
 24843 000043B7 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 24844 000043B9 E8A10D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 24845 000043BC 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 24846 000043BE 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 24847                                  
 24848                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 24849                                  
 24850 000043BF AD                      	LODSW
 24851 000043C0 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 24852 000043C3 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 24853                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 24854 000043C6 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 24855 000043C8 AC                      	LODSB
 24856 000043C9 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 24857 000043CB 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 24858 000043CD 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 24859 000043CF AC                      	LODSB
 24860 000043D0 E88A0D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 24861 000043D3 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 24862                                  
 24863                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 24864                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 24865                                  
 24866                                  ParseDev:
 24867 000043D5 1E                      	push	ds
 24868 000043D6 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 24869 000043D7 E8C10C                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 24870 000043DA 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 24871 000043DD F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 24872 000043DE 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 24873                                  
 24874                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24875 000043E0 16                      	push	ss
 24876 000043E1 1F                      	pop	ds
 24877                                  
 24878                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 24879                                  ;
 24880                                  ; SR;
 24881                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 24882                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 24883                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 24884                                  
 24885 000043E2 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 24886 000043E5 A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 24887                                  
 24888                                  ; M026 - end
 24889                                  
 24890 000043E8 E87FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 24891                                  
 24892                                  SkipSearch:
 24893 000043EB 5E                      	pop	si
 24894 000043EC 1F                      	pop	ds
 24895                                  
 24896                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 24897                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 24898                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 24899                                  
 24900                                  CheckReturn:
 24901 000043ED 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 24902 000043EE 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 24903 000043F0 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 24904                                  Check_Done:
 24905 000043F2 5F                      	pop	di
 24906 000043F3 F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 24907 000043F4 C3                      	retn
 24908                                  NotDevice:
 24909 000043F5 F9                      	STC
 24910 000043F6 EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn
 24911                                  
 24912                                  ;BREAK <LookupPath - call fastopen to get dir entry info>
 24913                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24914                                  ;
 24915                                  ; Procedure Name : LookupPath
 24916                                  ;
 24917                                  ; Output  DS:SI -> path name,
 24918                                  ;	  ES:DI -> dir entry info buffer
 24919                                  ;	  ES:CX -> extended dir info buffer
 24920                                  ;
 24921                                  ;	  carry flag clear : tables pointed by ES:DI and ES:CX are filled by
 24922                                  ;			     FastOpen, DS:SI points to char just one after
 24923                                  ;			     the last char of path name which is fully or
 24924                                  ;			     partially found in FastOPen
 24925                                  ;	  carry flag set : FastOpen not in memory or path name not found
 24926                                  ;
 24927                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24928                                  
 24929                                  LookupPath:
 24930                                  ;	PUSH	AX
 24931                                  
 24932                                  ;hkn; SS override

 25163                                  ;Public DEV001S, DEV001E 		; Pathgen labels
 25164                                  ;DEV001s:
 25165                                  ;		length of packets
 25166 00004520 160E160D0F0E            LenTab:	 DB	DRDWRHL, DRDNDHL, DRDWRHL, DSTATHL, DFLSHL, DRDNDHL
 25167                                  ;LenTab: db	22,14,22,13,15,14
 25168                                  
 25169                                  ;	Error Function
 25170                                  
 25171                                  CmdTab:
 25172 00004526 8604                    	DB	86h, DEVRD	; 0 input
 25173 00004528 8605                    	DB	86h, DEVRDND	; 1 input status
 25174 0000452A 8708                    	DB	87h, DEVWRT	; 2 output
 25175 0000452C 870A                    	DB	87h, DEVOST	; 3 output status
 25176 0000452E 8607                    	DB	86h, DEVIFL	; 4 input flush

 25181                                  ;CmdTab:
 25182                                  ;	db	86h, 4

 25191                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25192                                  ; DOSCODE:8413h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25193                                  
 25194                                  ;Break	<IOFUNC -- DO FUNCTION 1-12 I/O>
 25195                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25196                                  ;
 25197                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 25198                                  ;
 25199                                  ; Inputs:
 25200                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 25201                                  ;	AH is function code
 25202                                  ;		= 0 Input
 25203                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 25204                                  ;		= 2 Output
 25205                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 25206                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 25207                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 25208                                  ;				   present.
 25209                                  ;	AL = character if output
 25210                                  ; Function:
 25211                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 25212                                  ; Outputs:
 25213                                  ;	AL is character if input
 25214                                  ;	If a status call
 25215                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 25216                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 25217                                  ; For regular files:
 25218                                  ;	Input Status
 25219                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 25220                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 25221                                  ;	Input
 25222                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 25223                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 25224                                  ;	Output Status
 25225                                  ;		Always ready
 25226                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved
 25227                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25228                                  
 25229                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25230                                  ; DOSCODE:83D8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25231                                  
 25232                                  IOFUNC:
 25233 00004532 368C16[8C03]            	MOV	[SS:IOXAD+2],SS		; SS override for IOXAD, IOSCNT, 
 25234                                  					; DEVIOBUF

 25255 00004565 8EC3                    	MOV	ES,BX
 25256 00004567 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX

 25258 0000456C 7503                    	jnz	short _no_sys_wait

 25260                                  	; 16/12/2022

 25262                                  	;or	bx,0400H	    ; Set bit 10 in status word for driver
 25263                                  				    ; It is up to device driver to carry out
 25264                                  				    ; appropriate action.

 25269

 25332                                  NO_RETRY:
 25333                                  	; Know user must have wanted Ignore OR Fail. Make sure device shows ready
 25334                                  	; ready so that DOS doesn't get caught in a status loop when user

 25448                                  ;
 25449                                  ;	Dev_Open_SFT issues an open call to the device associated with

 25480 00004691 B00E                    	MOV	AL,DEVCLS
 25481                                  
 25482                                  	; Main entry for device open and close. AL contains the function 
 25483                                  	; requested. Subtlety: if Sharing is NOT loaded then we do NOT issue 
 25484                                  	; open/close to block devices. This allows networks to function but 
 25485                                  	; does NOT hang up with bogus change-line code.

 25487                                  	;entry	DO_OPCLS

 25489                                  	; Is the SFT for the net? If so, no action necessary.
 25490

 25503                                  	; We are about to call device open/close on a block driver. If no 
 25504                                  	; sharing then just short circuit to done.

 25507                                  					; SS override

 25517                                  	;les	di,[es:di+13h] ; MSDOS 6.0

 25519                                  GOT_DEV_ADDR:				; ES:DI -> device

 25695                                  ;Break	<SETREAD, SETWRITE -- SET UP HEADER BLOCK>
 25696                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25697                                  ;
 25698                                  ; Procedure Name : SETREAD, SETWRITE
 25699                                  ;
 25700                                  ; Inputs:
 25701                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer Address
 25702                                  ;	CX = Record Count
 25703                                  ;	DX = Starting Record
 25704                                  ;	AH = Media Byte
 25705                                  ;	AL = Unit Code
 25706                                  ; Function:
 25707                                  ;	Set up the device call header at DEVCALL
 25708                                  ; Output:
 25709                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 25710                                  ; No other registers effected
 25711                                  ;
 25712                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25713                                  
 25714                                  SETREAD:

 25716 00004780 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25717 00004781 50                      	PUSH	AX
 25718 00004782 B104                    	MOV	CL,DEVRD ; mov cl,4
 25719                                  SETCALLHEAD:
 25720 00004784 B016                    	MOV	AL,DRDWRHL ; mov al,16h
 25721 00004786 16                      	PUSH	SS
 25722 00004787 07                      	POP	ES
 25723                                  					; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 25724 00004788 BF[5A03]                	MOV	DI,DEVCALL
 25725                                  
 25726 0000478B AA                      	STOSB				; length

 25735 00004798 58                      	POP	AX

 25782                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25783                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25784                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25785                                  
 25786                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 25787                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25788                                  ;
 25789                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 25790                                  ;
 25791                                  ; Inputs:
 25792                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 25793                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 25794                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 25795                                  ; Function:
 25796                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 25797                                  ; Output:
 25798                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 25799                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 25800                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 25801                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 25802                                  ;
 25803                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25804                                  
 25805                                  RW_SC:
 25806                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 25807                                  	
 25808 000047BE 36833E[7700]00          	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 25809 000047C4 7421                    	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 25810 000047C6 36833E[6C03]01          	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 25811 000047CC 7519                    	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 25812 000047CE 51                      	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 25813 000047CF 52                      	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 25814 000047D0 1E                      	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 25815 000047D1 56                      	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 25816 000047D2 06                      	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 25817 000047D3 57                      	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 25818                                  
 25819 000047D4 368B16[6E03]            	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 25820 000047D9 36803E[5C03]04          	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 25821 000047DF 7408                    	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 25822 000047E1 E8C400                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 25823 000047E4 E98E00                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 25824                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 25825 000047E7 F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 25826 000047E8 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;LB.

 25882                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>

 25885                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 25886                                  ;
 25887                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 25888                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 25889                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 25890                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 25891                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 25892                                  ; Function:
 25893                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 25894                                  ; Output:

 26025                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 26026                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26027                                  ;
 26028                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 26029                                  ;
 26030                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 26031                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 26032                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 26033                                  ; Function:
 26034                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 26035                                  ; Output:
 26036                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved

 26042 00004912 E868FF                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache

 26045 0000491A D3E0                    	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 26046 0000491C 368506[B50D]            	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.

 26048                                  ;entry SC2BUF2

 26081                                  ;	TITLE	MKNODE - Node maker
 26082                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 26083                                  
 26084                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 26085                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26086                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 26087                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 26088                                  ;
 26089                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 26090                                  ;	SETDOTENT
 26091                                  ;	MakeNode
 26092                                  ;	NEWENTRY
 26093                                  ;	FREEENT
 26094                                  ;	NEWDIR
 26095                                  ;	DOOPEN
 26096                                  ;	RENAME_MAKE
 26097                                  ;	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 26098                                  ;
 26099                                  ;	Revision history:
 26100                                  ;
 26101                                  ;	 AN000	version 4.0  Jan. 1988
 26102                                  ;	 A004	PTM 3680  --- Make SFT NAME field offset same as 3.30
 26103                                  
 26104                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 26105                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26106                                  ;
 26107                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 26108                                  ;
 26109                                  ; Inputs:
 26110                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 26111                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 26112                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 26113                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 26114                                  ;               entries
 26115                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 26116                                  ; Function:
 26117                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 26118                                  ; Outputs:
 26119                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 26120                                  ;       ELSE
 26121                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 26122                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 26123                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 26124                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 26125                                  ;
 26126                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26127                                  
 26128                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26129                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26130                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26131                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26132                                  
 26133                                  BUILDDIR:
 26134                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 26135                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 4E66h
 26136                                  
 26137 0000495A A1[D805]                        MOV     AX,[ENTFREE]
 26138 0000495D 83F8FF                          CMP     AX,-1
 26139 00004960 7402                            JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 26140 00004962 F8                              CLC
 26141 00004963 C3                              retn
 26142                                  
 26143                                  CHECK_IF_ROOT:
 26144 00004964 833E[C205]00                    CMP     word [DIRSTART],0
 26145 00004969 7502                            JNZ	short NEWDIR
 26146 0000496B F9                              STC
 26147                                  builddir_retn:
 26148 0000496C C3                              retn				; Can't grow root
 26149                                  
 26150                                  	;entry   NEWDIR
 26151                                  NEWDIR:        
 26152 0000496D 8B1E[C205]              	MOV     BX,[DIRSTART]
 26153 00004971 09DB                            OR      BX,BX
 26154 00004973 7405                            JZ	short NULLDIR
 26155 00004975 E84006                  	call	GETEOF
 26156 00004978 72F2                            jc	short builddir_retn	; Screw up
 26157                                  NULLDIR:
 26158 0000497A B90100                          MOV     CX,1
 26159 0000497D E85105                  	call	ALLOCATE
 26160 00004980 72EA                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 26161 00004982 8B16[C205]                      MOV     DX,[DIRSTART]
 26162 00004986 09D2                            OR      DX,DX
 26163 00004988 750D                            JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 26164 0000498A E8BAF5                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 26165 0000498D 72DD                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 26166 0000498F C706[4803]FFFF                  MOV     word [LASTENT],-1
 26167 00004995 EB2B                            JMP     SHORT GOTDIRREC
 26168                                  ADDINGDIR:
 26169 00004997 53                              PUSH    BX
 26170 00004998 8B1E[BC05]                      MOV     BX,[CLUSNUM]
 26171 0000499C E84B0C                          call	IsEOF
 26172 0000499F 5B                              POP     BX
 26173 000049A0 7219                            JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 26174                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 26175 000049A2 891E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],BX
 26176 000049A6 51                              PUSH    CX
 26177 000049A7 50                              PUSH    AX
 26178 000049A8 55                              PUSH    BP
 26179 000049A9 B401                            MOV     AH,1			; CLUSNUM update
 26180                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26181 000049AB 268A5600                	mov	dl,[ES:BP] ; 09/09/2018
 26182                                          ; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26183                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 26184                                  	;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; drive #
 26185 000049AF 8B0E[C205]                      MOV     CX,[DIRSTART]		; first cluster #
 26186 000049B3 89DD                            MOV     BP,BX 			; CLUSNUM
 26187 000049B5 E8A7DD                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 26188 000049B8 5D                              POP     BP
 26189 000049B9 58                              POP     AX
 26190 000049BA 59                              POP     CX
 26191                                  
 26192                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 26193                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:
 26194 000049BB 89DA                            MOV     DX,BX
 26195 000049BD 30DB                            XOR     BL,BL
 26196 000049BF E8E304                  	call	FIGREC
 26197                                  GOTDIRREC:
 26198                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 26199 000049C2 268A4E04                        MOV     CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 26200 000049C6 FEC1                            INC     CL
 26201 000049C8 30ED                            XOR     CH,CH
 26202                                  ZERODIR:
 26203 000049CA 51                              PUSH    CX
 26204                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 26205 000049CB C606[4B03]18                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 26206 000049D0 B0FF                            MOV     AL,0FFH
 26207 000049D2 E84E10                          call	GETBUFFR
 26208 000049D5 7302                            JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 26209 000049D7 59                              POP     CX
 26210 000049D8 C3                              retn
 26211                                  
 26212                                  GET_SSIZE:
 26213                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 26214 000049D9 268B4E02                        MOV     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 26215 000049DD 06                              PUSH    ES
 26216 000049DE C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 26217                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 26218 000049E2 26804D0504                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 26219 000049E7 57                              PUSH    DI
 26220                                  	;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 26221                                  	;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 26222 000049E8 83C714                          ADD     DI,BUFINSIZ
 26223 000049EB 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26224 000049ED D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 26225 000049EF F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 26226 000049F1 7301                            JNC	short EVENZ
 26227 000049F3 AA                              STOSB
 26228                                  EVENZ:
 26229 000049F4 5F                              POP     DI
 26230                                  
 26231                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26232 000049F5 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 26233                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 26234 000049FA 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty7		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 26235 000049FC E82A12                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 26236                                          
 26237                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 26238 000049FF 26804D0540              	OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 26239                                  yesdirty7:
 26240 00004A04 07                              POP	ES
 26241 00004A05 59                              POP	CX
 26242                                  
 26243                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26244                                  
 26245                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 26246                                  	;INC	DX
 26247                                  
 26248                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26249 00004A06 83C201                  	add	dx,1
 26250 00004A09 8316[0706]00            	adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 26251                                  
 26252 00004A0E E2BA                            LOOP    ZERODIR
 26253                                  
 26254 00004A10 A1[4803]                        MOV     AX,[LASTENT]
 26255 00004A13 40                              INC     AX
 26256 00004A14 F8                              CLC
 26257 00004A15 C3                              retn
 26258                                  
 26259                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26260                                  ;
 26261                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 26262                                  ;
 26263                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 26264                                  ;
 26265                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 26266                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 26267                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 26268                                  ;
 26269                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26270                                  
 26271                                  SETDOTENT:
 26272                                  ;	Fill in name field
 26273 00004A16 AB                              STOSW
 26274 00004A17 B90400                          MOV     CX,4
 26275 00004A1A B82020                          MOV     AX,"  " ; 2020h
 26276 00004A1D F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 26277 00004A1F AA                              STOSB
 26278                                  
 26279                                  ;	Set up attribute
 26280                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 26281 00004A20 B010                            MOV     AL,attr_directory
 26282 00004A22 AA                              STOSB
 26283                                  
 26284                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 26285 00004A23 83C70A                          ADD     DI,10
 26286 00004A26 8B36[9E05]                      MOV     SI,[THISSFT]
 26287                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 26288 00004A2A 8B440D                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 26289 00004A2D AB                              STOSW
 26290                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 26291 00004A2E 8B440F                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 26292 00004A31 AB                      	STOSW
 26293                                  
 26294                                  ;	Set up first cluster field
 26295 00004A32 89D0                            MOV     AX,DX
 26296 00004A34 AB                              STOSW
 26297                                  
 26298                                  ;	0 file size
 26299 00004A35 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26300 00004A37 AB                              STOSW
 26301 00004A38 AB                              STOSW
 26302 00004A39 C3                              retn
 26303                                  
 26304                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 26305                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26306                                  ;
 26307                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 26308                                  ;
 26309                                  ; Inputs:
 26310                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 26311                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 26312                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 26313                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 26314                                  ;
 26315                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 26316                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 26317                                  ;
 26318                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 26319                                  ;               terminated)
 26320                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 26321                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 26322                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 26323                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 26324                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 26325                                  ; Function:
 26326                                  ;       Make a new node
 26327                                  ; Outputs:
 26328                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 26329                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 26330                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 26331                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 26332                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 26333                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 26334                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 26335                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 26336                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 26337                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 26338                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 26339                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 26340                                  ;       ELSE
 26341                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 26342                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 26343                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 26344                                  ;               containing new node.
 26345                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 26346                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 26347                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 26348                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 26349                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 26350                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 26351                                  ;
 26352                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26353                                  
 26354                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26355                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26356                                  
 26357                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26358                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26359                                  
 26360                                  MakeNode:
 26361                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 26362 00004A3A C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 26363 00004A40 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save AH value
 26364 00004A41 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 26365 00004A46 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 26366 00004A49 E861F5                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 26367 00004A4C 88CA                            MOV     DL,CL           ; Save CL info
 26368 00004A4E 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Device ID to CH
 26369 00004A50 58                              POP     AX              ; Get back AH
 26370 00004A51 732E                            JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 26371 00004A53 7505                            JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 26372 00004A55 80FA80                          CMP     DL,80h          ; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 26373 00004A58 7406                            JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 26374                                  make_err_4:
 26375 00004A5A B004                            MOV     AL,4            ; case 1 bad path
 26376                                  make_err_ret:
 26377 00004A5C 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 26378 00004A5E F9                              STC
 26379                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 26380 00004A5F C3                              retn
 26381                                  
 26382                                          ;entry	RENAME_MAKE     ; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 26383                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 26384                                  make_type:
 26385                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 26386                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26387                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 26388 00004A60 F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 26389 00004A65 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 26390 00004A67 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 26391                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 26392                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 26393 00004A6C F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 26394 00004A71 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 26395 00004A73 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 26396 00004A74 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 26397                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26398                                  make_retn:
 26399                                  	;return
 26400 00004A77 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 26401                                  
 26402                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 26403                                  
 26404                                  make_type2:
 26405 00004A78 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 26406 00004A7C 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX           ; nothing exists Disk Node
 26407 00004A7E F9                              STC                     ; Not found
 26408 00004A7F EB5A                            JMP     short make_new
 26409                                  
 26410                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 26411                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 26412                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 26413                                  ;   else => file
 26414                                  
 26415                                  make_exists:
 26416 00004A81 7448                            JZ	short make_exists_dir
 26417 00004A83 B003                            MOV     AL,3            ; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 26418                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 26419 00004A85 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 26420 00004A8A 753B                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 26421                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 26422                                                                  ;       if making DIR or Volume ID
 26423 00004A8C 08ED                            OR      CH,CH
 26424 00004A8E 781A                            JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 26425 00004A90 08E4                            OR      AH,AH
 26426 00004A92 75C8                            JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 26427 00004A94 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save device ID
 26428 00004A95 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 26429                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 26430 00004A99 268A6F0B                        MOV     CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 26431                                  	;test	ch,1
 26432 00004A9D F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 26433 00004AA0 7524                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 26434 00004AA2 E8B8F7                  	call	MatchAttributes
 26435 00004AA5 59                              POP     CX              ; Devid back in CH
 26436 00004AA6 751F                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 26437 00004AA8 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL           ; AL = 0, Disk Node
 26438                                  make_share:
 26439 00004AAA 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 26440 00004AAC 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save Disk or Device node
 26441 00004AAD 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save Device ID
 26442 00004AAE 88EC                            MOV     AH,CH           ; Device ID to AH
 26443 00004AB0 E84601                          CALL    DOOPEN          ; Fill in SFT for share check
 26444 00004AB3 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 26445 00004AB7 56                      	push	si
 26446 00004AB8 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 26447 00004AB9 E89629                  	call	ShareEnter
 26448 00004ABC 735A                            jnc	short MakeEndShare
 26449                                  
 26450                                  ; User failed request.
 26451 00004ABE 5B                      	pop	bx
 26452 00004ABF 5E                      	pop	si
 26453 00004AC0 59                      	pop	cx
 26454 00004AC1 58                      	pop	ax
 26455                                  
 26456                                  Make_Share_ret:
 26457 00004AC2 B006                            MOV     AL,6
 26458 00004AC4 EB96                            JMP	short make_err_ret
 26459                                  
 26460                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 26461 00004AC6 59                              POP     CX              ; Get back device ID
 26462                                  make_err_ret_5:
 26463 00004AC7 B005                            MOV     AL,5            ; Attribute mismatch
 26464                                          ; 22/11/2022
 26465 00004AC9 EB91                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 26466                                  
 26467                                  make_exists_dir:
 26468 00004ACB B001                            MOV     AL,1            ; exists as directory, always an error
 26469                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26470 00004ACD EB8D                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 26471                                  
 26472                                  make_save:
 26473 00004ACF 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save whether Disk or File
 26474 00004AD0 89C8                            MOV     AX,CX           ; Device ID to AH
 26475 00004AD2 E87400                          CALL    NEWENTRY
 26476 00004AD5 58                              POP     AX              ; 0 if Disk, 3 if File
 26477 00004AD6 739F                            jnc	short make_retn
 26478 00004AD8 B002                            MOV     AL,2            ; create failed case 2
 26479                                  make_save_retn:
 26480 00004ADA C3                              retn
 26481                                  
 26482                                  make_new:
 26483 00004ADB E8F1FF                          call    make_save
 26484 00004ADE 72FA                            jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 26485                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 26486 00004AE0 F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory
 26487 00004AE5 75F3                            jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 26488                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 26489 00004AE7 50                      	push	ax
 26490 00004AE8 53                      	push	bx
 26491 00004AE9 56                      	push	si		
 26492 00004AEA E86529                          call	ShareEnter
 26493 00004AED 5E                      	pop	si
 26494 00004AEE 5B                      	pop	bx
 26495 00004AEF 58                      	pop	ax
 26496 00004AF0 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 26497                                  
 26498                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 26499                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 26500                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 26501                                  
 26502 00004AF2 50                              PUSH    AX
 26503 00004AF3 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 26504                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h
 26505 00004AF7 26C607E5                	MOV	BYTE [ES:BX],DIRFREE	; nuke newly created entry.
 26506                                  	
 26507                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26508                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 26509 00004AFB 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 26510                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 26511 00004B00 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty8		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 26512                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26513 00004B02 E82411                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 26514                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 26515 00004B05 26804D0540                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 26516                                  yesdirty8:
 26517 00004B0A C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 26518                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26519 00004B0E 268A4600                        mov	al,[ES:BP]
 26520                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26521                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 26522                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 26523 00004B12 E80C10                          call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 26524 00004B15 58                              POP     AX
 26525 00004B16 EBAA                            jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 26526                                  
 26527                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 26528                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 26529                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 26530                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 26531                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 26532                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 26533                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 26534                                  ;
 26535                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 26536                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 26537                                  
 26538                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26539                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26540                                  
 26541                                  MakeEndShare:
 26542 00004B18 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 26543 00004B1C 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26544 00004B1E E867C8                  	call	ECritSFT
 26545 00004B21 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 26546                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 26547 00004B24 50                      	push	ax
 26548 00004B25 57                      	push	di
 26549 00004B26 06                      	push	es
 26550 00004B27 9C                              PUSHF
 26551 00004B28 E82229                          call	ShareEnd                ; remove sharing
 26552 00004B2B 9D                              POPF
 26553 00004B2C 07                      	pop	es
 26554 00004B2D 5F                      	pop	di
 26555 00004B2E 268F05                          pop	word [ES:DI]	
 26556                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 26557 00004B31 E86FC8                  	call	LCritSFT
 26558                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26559                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26560 00004B34 5B                      	pop	bx
 26561 00004B35 5E                      	pop	si
 26562 00004B36 59                      	pop	cx
 26563 00004B37 58                      	pop	ax
 26564 00004B38 E894FF                          CALL    make_save
 26565                                  
 26566                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 26567                                  
 26568 00004B3B 729D                            jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 26569 00004B3D 50                      	push	ax
 26570 00004B3E 53                      	push	bx
 26571 00004B3F 56                      	push	si
 26572 00004B40 9C                              PUSHF
 26573 00004B41 E80E29                          call	ShareEnter
 26574 00004B44 9D                              POPF
 26575 00004B45 5E                      	pop	si
 26576 00004B46 5B                      	pop	bx
 26577 00004B47 58                      	pop	ax
 26578                                  
 26579                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 26580                                  
 26581                                  makeendshare_retn:
 26582 00004B48 C3                              retn
 26583                                  
 26584                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26585                                  ;
 26586                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 26587                                  ;
 26588                                  ; Inputs:
 26589                                  ;       [THISSFT] set
 26590                                  ;       [THISDPB] set
 26591                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 26592                                  ;               entries
 26593                                  ;       [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 26594                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 26595                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 26596                                  ;       CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 26597                                  ;               NC means file existed (device)
 26598                                  ;               C  means file did not exist
 26599                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 26600                                  ;       If FILE
 26601                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 26602                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 26603                                  ;       If device
 26604                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 26605                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 26606                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 26607                                  ; Function:
 26608                                  ;       Make a new directory entry
 26609                                  ;       If an old one existed it is truncated first
 26610                                  ; Outputs:
 26611                                  ;       Carry set if error
 26612                                  ;               Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 26613                                  ;               vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 26614                                  ;       else
 26615                                  ;               outputs of DOOPEN
 26616                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 26617                                  ;
 26618                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26619                                  
 26620                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26621                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26622                                  
 26623                                  NEWENTRY:
 26624 00004B49 C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 26625 00004B4D 7316                            JNC	short EXISTENT	
 26626 00004B4F 803E[4A03]00                    CMP     byte [FAILERR],0
 26627 00004B54 F9                              STC
 26628 00004B55 75F1                            jnz	short makeendshare_retn	; User FAILed, node might exist
 26629 00004B57 E800FE                          CALL    BUILDDIR        ; Try to build dir
 26630 00004B5A 72EC                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 26631 00004B5C E8BAF3                          call	GETENT          ; Point at that free entry
 26632 00004B5F 72E7                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 26633 00004B61 EB0E                            JMP     SHORT FREESPOT
 26634                                  
 26635                                  ERRRET3:
 26636 00004B63 F9                              STC
 26637                                  newentry_retn:
 26638 00004B64 C3                              retn
 26639                                  
 26640                                  EXISTENT:
 26641 00004B65 08E4                            OR      AH,AH           ; Check if file is I/O device
 26642 00004B67 7903                            JNS	short NOT_DEV1
 26643 00004B69 E98D00                          JMP     DOOPEN          ; If so, proceed with open
 26644                                  
 26645                                  NOT_DEV1:
 26646 00004B6C E82C01                          call	FREEENT		; Free cluster chain
 26647 00004B6F 72F3                            jc	short newentry_retn ; Failed
 26648                                  FREESPOT:
 26649                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],8
 26650 00004B71 F606[6B05]08            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id
 26651 00004B76 7407                            JZ	short NOTVOLID
 26652 00004B78 803E[7B05]00                    CMP     BYTE [VOLID],0
 26653 00004B7D 75E4                            JNZ	short ERRRET3	; Can't create a second volume ID
 26654                                  NOTVOLID:
 26655 00004B7F 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 26656 00004B83 89DF                            MOV     DI,BX
 26657                                  
 26658 00004B85 BE[4B05]                        MOV     SI,NAME1
 26659                                  
 26660 00004B88 B90500                          MOV     CX,5
 26661 00004B8B F3A5                            REP     MOVSW
 26662 00004B8D A4                              MOVSB                   ; Move name into dir entry
 26663 00004B8E A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 26664 00004B91 AA                      	STOSB                   ; Attributes
 26665                                  
 26666                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 26667 00004B92 B105                            MOV     CL,5            ;FT. assume normal FBUGBUG	;AN000;
 26668                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 26669                                  
 26670 00004B94 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26671 00004B96 F3AB                            REP     STOSW           ; Zero pad
 26672 00004B98 E8ABBF                          call	DATE16
 26673 00004B9B 92                              XCHG    AX,DX
 26674 00004B9C AB                              STOSW                   ; dir_time
 26675 00004B9D 92                              XCHG    AX,DX
 26676 00004B9E AB                              STOSW                   ; dir_date
 26677 00004B9F 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26678 00004BA1 57                              PUSH    DI              ; Correct SI input value
 26679                                  				; 	(recomputed for new buffer)
 26680 00004BA2 AB                              STOSW                   ; Zero dir_first and size
 26681 00004BA3 AB                              STOSW
 26682 00004BA4 AB                              STOSW
 26683                                  updnxt:
 26684 00004BA5 8B36[E205]              	MOV	SI,[CURBUF]
 26685                                  
 26686                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26687                                  
 26688                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 26706                                  ; If we have a file, we need to increment the open ref. count so that
 26707                                  ; we have some protection against invalid media changes if an Int 24

 26740 00004BF6 7301                    	jnc	short DOOPEN    ; Failed

 26745                                  ; DOSCODE:8AE4h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26746                                  
 26747                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26748                                  ; DOSCODE:8AA9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26749                                  
 26750                                  ; DOOPEN
 26751                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26752                                  ;
 26753                                  ; Inputs:
 26754                                  ;       [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 26755                                  ;       [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 26756                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 26757                                  ;       If FILE
 26758                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 26759                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 26760                                  ;       If device
 26761                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 26762                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 26763                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 26764                                  ; Function:
 26765                                  ;       Fill in SFT from dir entry
 26766                                  ; Outputs:
 26767                                  ;       CARRY CLEAR
 26768                                  ;       sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 26769                                  ;       sf_flags high byte = 0
 26770                                  ;       sf_flags low byte = AH except
 26771                                  ;       sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 26772                                  ;       sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 26773                                  ;       sf_position = 0
 26774                                  ;       If device
 26775                                  ;           sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 26776                                  ;           sf_size = 0
 26777                                  ;       If file
 26778                                  ;           sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 26779                                  ;           sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 26780                                  ;           sf_cluspos = 0
 26781                                  ;           sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 26782                                  ;           sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 26783                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 26784                                  ;
 26785                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26786                                  
 26787                                  	;entry	DOOPEN
 26788                                  DOOPEN:
 26789                                  ;	Generate and store attribute
 26790                                  
 26791 00004BF9 88E6                            MOV     DH,AH           ; AH to different place
 26792 00004BFB C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 26793                                  	;add	di,4
 26794 00004BFF 83C704                          ADD     DI,SF_ENTRY.sf_attr ; Skip ref_count and mode fields
 26795 00004C02 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL           ; Assume it's a device, devices have an
 26796                                                                  ;   attribute of 0 (for R/O testing etc).
 26797 00004C04 08F6                            OR      DH,DH           ; See if our assumption good.
 26798 00004C06 7807                            JS	short DEV_SFT1	; If device DS=DOSGROUP
 26799 00004C08 8E1E[E405]                      MOV     DS,[CURBUF+2]
 26800                                  	;mov	al,[BX+0Bh]
 26801 00004C0C 8A470B                          MOV     AL,[BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 26802                                  				; If file, get attrib from dir entry
 26803                                  DEV_SFT1:
 26804 00004C0F AA                              STOSB                   ; sf_attr, ES:DI -> sf_flags
 26805                                  
 26806                                  ;	Generate and store flags word
 26807

 26809 00004C12 88F0                            MOV     AL,DH
 26810                                  	;or	al,40h
 26811 00004C14 0C40                            OR      AL,devid_file_clean
 26812 00004C16 AB                              STOSW                   ; sf_flags, ES:DI -> sf_devptr
 26813                                  
 26814                                  ;	Generate and store device pointer
 26815                                  
 26816 00004C17 1E                              PUSH    DS
 26817                                  	;lds	ax,[bx+1Ah]

 26819 00004C1B 08F6                            OR      DH,DH

 26821                                  
 26822                                  ;hkn; SS override
 26823 00004C1F 36C506[8A05]                    LDS     AX,[SS:THISDPB]	; Was file
 26824                                  DEV_SFT2:
 26825 00004C24 AB                              STOSW 			; store offset
 26826 00004C25 8CD8                            MOV     AX,DS
 26827 00004C27 1F                              POP     DS
 26828 00004C28 AB                      	STOSW			; store segment
 26829                                  				; ES:DI -> sf_firclus
 26830                                  
 26831                                  ;	Generate pointer to, generate and store first cluster 
 26832                                  ;	(irrelevant for devices)
 26833                                  
 26834 00004C29 56                              PUSH    SI              ; Save pointer to dir_first
 26835 00004C2A A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_first -> sf_firclus
 26836                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_size_l, ES:DI -> sf_time
 26837

 26839                                  
 26840                                  	;sub	si,6

 26842                                  				; DS:SI->dir_time
 26843 00004C2E A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_time -> sf_time
 26844                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_date, ES:DI -> sf_date
 26845 00004C2F A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_date -> sf_date
 26846                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_first, ES:DI -> sf_size
 26847                                  
 26848                                  ;	Generate and store file size (0 for devices)
 26849                                  
 26850 00004C30 AD                              LODSW                   ; skip dir_first, DS:SI -> dir_size_l
 26851 00004C31 AD                              LODSW                   ; dir_size_l in AX , DS:SI -> dir_size_h
 26852 00004C32 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; dir_size_l in CX
 26853 00004C34 AD                              LODSW                   ; dir_size_h (size AX:CX), DS:SI -> ????
 26854 00004C35 08F6                            OR      DH,DH
 26855 00004C37 7904                            JNS	short FILE_SFT1
 26856 00004C39 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX

 26858                                  FILE_SFT1:
