 39568                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39569                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 39570                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 39571                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 39572                                  ;
 39573                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 39574                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 39575                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 39576                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39577                                  
 39578                                  ShareEnd:
 39579                                  	; 26/07/2019
 39580 0000744D FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 39581 00007451 C3                      	retn
 39582                                  
 39583                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 39584                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39585                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 39586                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 39587                                  ;
 39588                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 39589                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 39590                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 39591                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 39592                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 39593                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39594                                  
 39595                                  ShareEnter:
 39596 00007452 51                      	push	cx
 39597                                  retry:
 39598 00007453 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 39599                                  attempt:
 39600 00007457 C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 39601 0000745B 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 39602                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],axfff
 39603 0000745D 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 39604 00007461 51                      	push	cx
 39605 00007462 E8BDFF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 39606 00007465 59                      	pop	cx
 39607 00007466 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 39608 00007468 E8139E                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 39609 0000746B E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 39610 0000746D E8B7FF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 39611 00007470 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 39612                                  done:
 39613 00007472 59                      	pop	cx
 39614 00007473 C3                      	retn
 39615                                  
 39616                                  ;============================================================================
 39617                                  ; EXEPATCH.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 39618                                  ;============================================================================
 39619                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0
 39620                                  
 39621                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 39622                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39623                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 39624                                  ;
 39625                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 39626                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 39627                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 39628                                  ;
 39629                                  ;	Revision history:
 39630                                  ;
 39631                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 39632                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39633                                  
 39634                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39635                                  ;
 39636                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 39637                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 39638                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 39639                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 39640                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 39641                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 39642                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 39643                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 39644                                  ;
 39645                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39646                                  
 39647                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 39648                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 39649                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 39650                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 39651                                  
 39652                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 39653                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 39654                                  
 39655                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 39656                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 39657                                  
 39658                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 39659                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 39660                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 39661                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 39662                                  
 39663                                  PATCH3_COM_OFFSET	EQU	074H
 39664                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 39665                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 39666                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2
 39667                                  
 39668                                  ;**	Data structure passed for ExecReady call
 39669                                  ;
 39670                                  ;struc ERStruc
 39671                                  ; .ER_Reserved:	resw	1	; reserved, should be zero
 39672                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 39673                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 39674                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 39675                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 39676                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 39677                                  ; .size:
 39678                                  ;endstruc
 39679                                  
 39680                                  ;DOSCODE SEGMENT
 39681                                  
 39682                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39683                                  	; DOSCODE:B3DDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 39684                                  
 39685                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 39686                                  	; DOSCODE:B37Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 39687                                  
 39688                                  ; M028 - BEGIN
 39689                                  
 39690                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39691                                  ;
 39692                                  ;	Procedure Name		: ExecReady
 39693                                  ;
 39694                                  ;	Input			: DS:DX -> ERStruc (see exe.inc)
 39695                                  ;
 39696                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39697                                  
 39698                                  ExecReady:
 39699 00007474 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 39700                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 39701                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39702 00007476 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 39703                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 39704 0000747A 7413                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 39705                                  
 39706                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 39707 0000747C 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 39708 0000747F 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 39709 00007482 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39710                                  
 39711                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 39712 00007484 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 39713                                  	;mov	cx,[si+12]
 39714 00007487 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 39715                                  
 39716 0000748A 36FF16[1212]            	call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 39717                                  	
 39718                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 39719                                  	;call	[ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 39720                                  
 39721                                  er_setver:
 39722                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 39723                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39724 0000748F F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 39725                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 39726 00007493 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 39727                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 39728 00007495 1E                      	push	ds
 39729 00007496 56                      	push	si
 39730                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 39731 00007497 C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 39732 0000749A E870ED                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 39733 0000749D E881ED                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 39734 000074A0 5E                      	pop	si
 39735 000074A1 1F                      	pop	ds
 39736                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 39737 000074A2 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 39738 000074A5 36A1[BD0E]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 39739 000074A9 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 39740                                  
 39741                                  er_chkdoshi:
 39742 000074AD 36803E[1112]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 39743 000074B3 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 39744                                  
 39745                                  					; M068 - Start
 39746                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 39747 000074B5 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 39748                                  
 39749                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 39750 000074B8 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 39751                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 39752                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 39753                                  					; explanation
 39754                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 39755                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39756 000074BE F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 39757                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 39758 000074C2 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 39759                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 39760 000074C4 1E                         	push	ds
 39761 000074C5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 39762 000074C7 E85D03                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 39763 000074CA 1F                      	pop	ds
 39764                                  
 39765                                  er_setA20:
 39766                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 39767                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 39768                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 39769                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 39770                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 39771                                  
 39772 000074CB 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 39773 000074D0 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 39774                                  					; turned OFF.
 39775                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 39776 000074D4 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 39777 000074D6 C3                      	retn
 39778                                  
 39779                                  ; M028 - END

 39782                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 39783                                  %if 0
 39784                                  
 39785                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39786                                  ;
 39787                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 39788                                  ;
 39789                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 39790                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 39791                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 39792                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 39793                                  ;
 39794                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 39795                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 39796                                  ;
 39797                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 39798                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 39799                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 39800                                  ;
 39801                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 39802                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 39803                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 39804                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 39805                                  ; or not.
 39806                                  ;
 39807                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 39808                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 39809                                  ; running in the HMA.
 39810                                  ;
 39811                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 39812                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 39813                                  ;
 39814                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39815                                  
 39816                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39817                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 39818                                  
 39819                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39820                                  ;
 39821                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 39822                                  ;
 39823                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39824                                  
 39825                                  rpFind1:
 39826                                  	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 39827                                  
 39828                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 39829                                  
 39830                                  ;	cli
 39831                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 39832                                  ;	pusha
 39833                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 39834                                  ;	out	43h, al
 39835                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 39836                                  
 39837                                  rpFind1a:
 39838                                  	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 39839                                  
 39840                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 39841                                  
 39842                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 39843                                  ;	out	37h, al
 39844                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 39845                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 39846                                  
 39847                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 39848                                  
 39849                                  rpFind2:
 39850                                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 39851                                  
 39852                                  rpFind2Len equ	$ - rpFind2
 39853                                  
 39854                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 39855                                  
 39856                                  rpFind3:
 39857                                  	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 39858                                  
 39859                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 39860                                  
 39861                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 39862                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 39863                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 39864                                  
 39865                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 39866                                  
 39867                                  rpRepl2:
 39868                                   	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 39869                                  
 39870                                  rpRepl2Len equ	$ - rpRepl2
 39871                                  
 39872                                  ;	push	eax
 39873                                  ;	push	cx
 39874                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 39875                                  
 39876                                  rpRepl3:
 39877                                  	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 39878                                  
 39879                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 39880                                  
 39881                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 39882                                  ;	pop	cx
 39883                                  ;	pop	eax
 39884                                  
 39885                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 39886                                  
 39887                                  rpFind4:
 39888                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 39889                                  
 39890                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 39891                                  
 39892                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 39893                                  ;	pop	ax
 39894                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 39895                                  
 39896                                  rpFind5:
 39897                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 39898                                  
 39899                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 39900                                  
 39901                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 39902                                  ;	int	67h
 39903                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 39904                                  ;	jmp	bx
 39905                                  
 39906                                  rpRepl4:
 39907                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 39908                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 39909                                  
 39910                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 39911                                  
 39912                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39913                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 39914                                  
 39915                                  rpRepl4o2Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 39916                                  
 39917                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39918                                  
 39919                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 39920                                  
 39921                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 39922                                  ;	pop	ax
 39923                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 39924                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 39925                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 39926                                  
 39927                                  rpRepl5:
 39928                                  	db	8Bh, 0E1h
 39929                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 0A1h
 39930                                  
 39931                                  rpRepl5o1Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 39932                                  
 39933                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39934                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 8Bh, 36h
 39935                                  
 39936                                  rpRepl5o2Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 39937                                  
 39938                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39939                                  	db	0FFh, 0E3h
 39940                                  
 39941                                  rpRepl5Len equ	$ - rpRepl5
 39942                                  
 39943                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 39944                                  ;	mov	eax, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 39945                                  ;	mov	esi, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 39946                                  ;	jmp	bx
 39947                                  
 39948                                  ; bug # 3 -- loss of high EAX, EBX, ECX, EDX on 386+ only if VCPI
 39949                                  
 39950                                  rpFind6:
 39951                                  	db	0FAh, 52h, 51h
 39952                                  
 39953                                  rpFind6Len equ	$ - rpFind6
 39954                                  
 39955                                  ;	cli
 39956                                  ;	push	dx
 39957                                  ;	push	cx
 39958                                  
 39959                                  rpFind7a:
 39960                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 66h, 26h, 0FFh, 1Eh
 39961                                  
 39962                                  rpFind7aLen equ	$ - rpFind7a
 39963                                  
 39964                                  ;	mov	ax, 0DE0Ch
 39965                                  ;	call	fword ptr es:[xxxx]
 39966                                  
 39967                                  rpFind7b:
 39968                                  	db	59h, 5Ah, 5Bh
 39969                                  
 39970                                  rpFind7bLen equ	$ - rpFind7b
 39971                                  
 39972                                  ;	pop	cx
 39973                                  ;	pop	dx
 39974                                  ;	pop	bx
 39975                                  
 39976                                  rpRepl6 :
 39977                                  	db	0FAh, 66h, 50h, 66h, 53h, 66h, 51h, 66h, 52h
 39978                                  
 39979                                  rpRepl6Len equ	$ - rpRepl6
 39980                                  
 39981                                  ;	cli
 39982                                  ;	push	eax
 39983                                  ;	push	ebx
 39984                                  ;	push	ecx
 39985                                  ;	push	edx
 39986                                  
 39987                                  rpRepl7:
 39988                                  	db	66h, 5Ah, 66h, 59h, 66h, 5Bh, 66h, 58h, 5Bh
 39989                                  
 39990                                  rpRepl7Len equ	$ - rpRepl7
 39991                                  
 39992                                  ;	pop	edx
 39993                                  ;	pop	ecx
 39994                                  ;	pop	ebx
 39995                                  ;	pop	eax
 39996                                  ;	pop	bx
 39997                                  
 39998                                  ; bug # 4 -- loss of high EAX and EBX on 386+ only if VCPI
 39999                                  
 40000                                  rpFind8:
 40001                                   	db	60h, 06h, 1Eh, 0B8h, 00h, 00h, 8Eh, 0D8h
 40002                                  
 40003                                  rpFind8Len equ	$ - rpFind8
 40004                                  
 40005                                  ;	pusha
 40006                                  ;	push	es
 40007                                  ;	push	ds
 40008                                  ;	mov	ax, dgroup	;jump back to here from replace8
 40009                                  ;	mov	ds, ax
 40010                                  
 40011                                  rpFind9 :
 40012                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 61h
 40013                                  
 40014                                  rpFind9Len equ	$ - rpFind9
 40015                                  
 40016                                  ;	pop	ds
 40017                                  ;	pop	es
 40018                                  ;	popa
 40019                                  
 40020                                  rpRepl8:
 40021                                   	db	66h, 60h, 06h, 1Eh
 40022                                  
 40023                                  rpRepl8Len equ	$ - rpRepl8
 40024                                  
 40025                                  ;	pushad
 40026                                  ;	push	es
 40027                                  ;	push	ds
 40028                                  
 40029                                  rpRepl9:
 40030                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 66h, 61h, 0C3h
 40031                                  
 40032                                  rpRepl9Len equ	$ - rpRepl9
 40033                                  
 40034                                  ;	pop	ds
 40035                                  ;	pop	es
 40036                                  ;	popad
 40037                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 40038                                  
 40039                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40040                                  
 40041                                  struc SearchPair
 40042                                   .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 40043                                   .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 40044                                   .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40045                                   .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40046                                   .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 40047                                   .size:
 40048                                  endstruc
 40049                                  
 40050                                  ;rpBug1Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind2, rpFind2Len, offset rpFind3, rpFind3Len, 20h>
 40051                                  
 40052                                  rpBug1Strs:
 40053                                  	dw	rpFind2
 40054                                  	dw	rpFind2Len ; 3
 40055                                  	dw	rpFind3
 40056                                  	dw	rpFind3Len ; 4
 40057                                  	dw	20h
 40058                                  
 40059                                  ;rpBug2Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind4, rpFind4Len, offset rpFind5, rpFind5Len, 80h>
 40060                                  
 40061                                  rpBug2Strs:
 40062                                  	dw	rpFind4
 40063                                  	dw	rpFind4Len ; 4
 40064                                  	dw	rpFind5
 40065                                  	dw	rpFind5Len ; 9
 40066                                  	dw	80h
 40067                                  
 40068                                  ;rpBug3Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind6, rpFind6Len, offset rpFind7a, rpFind7aLen, 80h>
 40069                                  
 40070                                  rpBug3Strs:
 40071                                  	dw	rpFind6
 40072                                  	dw	rpFind6Len ; 3
 40073                                  	dw	rpFind7a
 40074                                  	dw	rpFind7aLen ; 7
 40075                                  	dw	80h
 40076                                  
 40077                                  ;rpBug4Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind8, 4, offset rpFind9, rpFind9Len, 80h>
 40078                                  
 40079                                  rpBug4Strs:
 40080                                  	dw	rpFind8
 40081                                  	dw	4
 40082                                  	dw	rpFind9
 40083                                  	dw	rpFind9Len ; 3
 40084                                  	dw	80h
 40085                                  
 40086                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40087                                  
 40088                                  struc StackVars
 40089                                   .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 40090                                   .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 40091                                   .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 40092                                   .size:
 40093                                  endstruc
 40094                                  
 40095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40096                                  
 40097                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40098                                  
 40099                                  Rational386Patch:
 40100                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 40101                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 40102                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 40103                                  
 40104                                  	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 40105                                  	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 40106                                  
 40107                                  	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 40108                                  	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 40109                                  
 40110                                  	push	ax
 40111                                  
 40112                                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 40113                                  	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 40114                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 40115                                  	cmp	[es:28],ax
 40116                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 40117                                  	cmp	[es:36],ax
 40118                                  	je	short rp3Maybe
 40119                                  rp3QO_ax:
 40120                                  	pop	ax
 40121                                  rp3QuickOut:
 40122                                  	retn
 40123                                  
 40124                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 40125                                  
 40126                                  rp3Maybe:
 40127                                  	cld
 40128                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 40129                                  	push	cx
 40130                                  	push	dx
 40131                                  	push	si
 40132                                  	push	di
 40133                                  	push	es
 40134                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 40135                                  	push	bp
 40136                                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 40137                                  	mov	bp,sp
 40138                                  
 40139                                  	push	cs
 40140                                  	pop	ds
 40141                                  
 40142                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 40143                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 40144                                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 40145                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 40146                                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 40147                                  	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 40148                                  
 40149                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 40150                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 40151                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 40152                                  ; an 80286 system.
 40153                                  
 40154                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 40155                                  
 40156                                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 40157                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 40158                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 40159                                  
 40160                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 40161                                  
 40162                                  	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 40163                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 40164                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 40165                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 40166                                  
 40167                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 40168                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 40169                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 40170                                  
 40171                                  	mov	si,rpFind1a
 40172                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1aLen  ;8
 40173                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 40174                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 40175                                  
 40176                                  rp3Exit_j:
 40177                                  	jmp	rp3Exit
 40178                                  
 40179                                  ; Found the location to write patch code! DI = offset in code seg.
 40180                                  
 40181                                  rpGotPatch:
 40182                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40183                                  	mov	[bp-StackVars.sv_pPatch],di	; save patch pointer
 40184                                  
 40185                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40186                                  ; Bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 40187                                  
 40188                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],381
 40189                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],381 ; only need bug 1 if version
 40190                                  	cmp	word [bp],381
 40191                                  	jae	short rpBug2			;   < 3.81
 40192                                  
 40193                                  	mov	bx,rpBug1Strs			; locate find2 & find3 code
 40194                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40195                                  	jc	short rpBug2
 40196                                  
 40197                                  ; si = rpFind2 offset, di = rpFind3 offset
 40198                                  
 40199                                  	push	di
 40200                                  	mov	di,si				; rpFind2 offset
 40201                                  	mov	dx,rpFind2Len ; 3
 40202                                  
 40203                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],51h	 	; find2 preceeded by push cx?
 40204                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx
 40205                                  
 40206                                  	dec	di				;   yes, gobble up push cx too
 40207                                  	inc	dx
 40208                                  rp_no_cx:
 40209                                  	mov	si,rpRepl2			; patch out find2 sequence
 40210                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl2Len  ; 6
 40211                                  	call	GenPatch
 40212                                  
 40213                                  	pop	di				; rpFind3 offset
 40214                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],59h 		; find3 preceeded by pop cx?
 40215                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx2

 40218                                  rp_no_cx2:

 40221                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],ax
 40222                                  	mov	[es:di+rpFind3Len],ax		;   to go to patch code
 40223

 40226                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl3Len ; 5

 40230                                  	add	bx,rpFind3Len+4	 ; 8		; skip over find3 and far jmp
 40231                                  	call	GenJump 			; jmp back from patch area
 40232                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40233                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch], di	;   to main-line, update patch
 40234                                  						;   area pointer
 40235                                  
 40236                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40237                                  ; Bug # 2 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40238                                  
 40239                                  rpBug2:
 40240                                  	mov	bx,rpBug2Strs			; locate find4 & find5 code
 40241                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40242                                  	jc	short rpBug3
 40243                                  
 40244                                  ; si = rpFind4 offset, di = rpFind5 offset
 40245                                  
 40246                                  	;push	word [bp+4]
 40247                                  	push	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; save current patch pointer
 40248                                  						;   (where repl4 goes)
 40249                                  	push	di				; save find5 offset
 40250                                  
 40251                                  	mov	di,si
 40252                                  	mov	dx,rpFind4Len ; 4
 40253                                  	mov	si,rpRepl4
 40254                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl4Len ; 15
 40255                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find4 code
 40256                                  
 40257                                  	pop	di				; find5 offset
 40258                                  	add	di,5				; keep 5 bytes of find5 code
 40259                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 40260                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; jump to patch area
 40261                                  	push	bx				; save repl5 location
 40262                                  	call	GenJump
 40263                                  
 40264                                  	mov	si,rpRepl5			; copy repl5 code to patch
 40265                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl5Len  ; 15		;   area -- it has a jmp bx
 40266                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no need to jmp back to
 40267                                  						;   main-line code
 40268                                  
 40269                                  ; patches have been made, now update the patch code to store/load dwords just
 40270                                  ; after the code in the patch area
 40271                                  
 40272                                  	pop	di				; repl5 location
 40273                                  	pop	si				; repl4 location
 40274                                  
 40275                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 40276                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; (where dwords go)
 40277                                  
 40278                                  	;mov	[es:si+7],ax
 40279                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o1Len],ax		; offset for EAX
 40280                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 40281                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o1Len],ax
 40282                                  	add	ax,4
 40283                                  	;mov	[es:si+0Dh],ax
 40284                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o2Len],ax		; offset for ESI
 40285                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],ax
 40286                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o2Len],ax
 40287                                  
 40288                                  	;add	word [bp+4],8
 40289                                  	add	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],8	; reserve space for 2 dwords in
 40290                                  						; patch area
 40291                                  
 40292                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40293                                  ; Bug # 3 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40294                                  
 40295                                  rpBug3:
 40296                                  	mov	bx,rpBug3Strs			; locate find6 & find7a code
 40297                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40298                                  	jc	short rpBug4
 40299                                  
 40300                                  	;add	di,9
 40301                                  	add	di,rpFind7aLen + 2		; skip over offset in find7a
 40302                                  	push	si				;   code and locate find7b
 40303                                  	mov	si,rpFind7b			;   sequence
 40304                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 40305                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di
 40306                                  	pop	si
 40307                                  	jnz	short rpBug4
 40308                                  
 40309                                  	push	di				; save find7b code offset
 40310                                  
 40311                                  	mov	di,si

 40315                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find6 code
 40316

 40319                                  	mov	si,rpRepl7
 40320                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl7Len ; 9
 40321                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find7b code
 40322                                  
 40323                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40324                                  ; Bug # 4 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40325                                  
 40326                                  rpBug4:
 40327                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],360
 40328                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],360 ; only applies if 
 40329                                  	cmp	word [bp],360
 40330                                  	jbe	short rp3Exit 			; version > 3.60 and < 3.95
 40331

 40333                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40334                                  	jc	short rp3Exit

 40343

 40348

 40350                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl9Len ; 5		;   patch area--it does a RET
 40351                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no jmp back to main-line
 40352                                  
 40353                                  rp3Exit:
 40354                                  	add	sp,StackVars.size
 40355                                  	pop	bp
 40356                                  	pop	ds
 40357                                  	pop	es
 40358                                  	pop	di
 40359                                  	pop	si
 40360                                  	pop	dx

 40362                                  	pop	bx
 40363                                  	pop	ax
 40364                                  	retn
 40365                                  
 40366                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40367                                  ;
 40368                                  ; FindBadCode
 40369                                  ;
 40370                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 40371                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 40372                                  ;
 40373                                  ; Entry:
 40374                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 40375                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 40376                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 40377                                  ;
 40378                                  ; Exit:
 40379                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 40380                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 40381                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 40382                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 40383                                  ;
 40384                                  ; Used:
 40385                                  ;	CX
 40386                                  ;
 40387                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40388                                  
 40389                                  ;struc SearchPair
 40390                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 40391                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 40392                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40393                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40394                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 40395                                  ; .size:
 40396                                  ;endstruc
 40397                                  
 40398                                  FindBadCode:
 40399                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 40400                                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 40401                                  
 40402                                  	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 40403                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 40404                                  	
 40405                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 40406                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 40407                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 40408                                  	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 40409                                  
 40410                                  	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 40411                                  
 40412                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 40413                                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 40414                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 40415                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 40416                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 40417                                  
 40418                                  	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 40419                                  	jnz	short fbc_error
 40420                                  
 40421                                  	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 40422                                  	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 40423                                  	jc	short fbc_error
 40424                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 40425                                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 40426                                  	ja	short fbc_error
 40427                                  
 40428                                  	clc
 40429                                  	retn
 40430                                  
 40431                                  fbc_error:
 40432                                  	stc
 40433                                  	retn
 40434                                  
 40435                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40436                                  ;
 40437                                  ; GenPatch
 40438                                  ;
 40439                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 40440                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 40441                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 40442                                  ; code.
 40443                                  ;
 40444                                  ; Entry:
 40445                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 40446                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 40447                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 40448                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 40449                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 40450                                  ;
 40451                                  ; Exit:
 40452                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 40453                                  ;
 40454                                  ; Used:
 40455                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 40456                                  ;
 40457                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40458                                  
 40459                                  GenPatch:
 40460                                  	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 40461                                  
 40462                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 40463                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 40464                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 40465                                  	call	GenJump
 40466                                  
 40467                                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 40468                                  
 40469                                  	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 40470                                  	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 40471                                  
 40472                                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 40473                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40474                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 40475                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 40476                                  	retn
 40477                                  
 40478                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40479                                  ;
 40480                                  ; CopyPatch
 40481                                  ;
 40482                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 40483                                  ;
 40484                                  ; Entry:
 40485                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 40486                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 40487                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 40488                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 40489                                  ;
 40490                                  ; Exit:
 40491                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 40492                                  ;
 40493                                  ; Used:
 40494                                  ;	SI, Flags
 40495                                  ;
 40496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40497                                  
 40498                                  CopyPatch:
 40499                                  	push	cx
 40500                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 40501                                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 40502                                  	cld
 40503                                  	rep movsb
 40504                                  	pop	cx
 40505                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40506                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 40507                                  	retn
 40508                                  
 40509                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40510                                  ;
 40511                                  ; GenJump
 40512                                  ;
 40513                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 40514                                  ;
 40515                                  ; Entry:
 40516                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 40517                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 40518                                  ;
 40519                                  ; Exit:
 40520                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 40521                                  ;
 40522                                  ; Used:
 40523                                  ;	AX
 40524                                  ;
 40525                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40526                                  
 40527                                  GenJump:
 40528                                  	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 40529                                  	stosb
 40530                                  
 40531                                  	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 40532                                  	sub	ax,di
 40533                                  	sub	ax,2
 40534                                  
 40535                                  	stosw			; output offset
 40536                                  
 40537                                  	retn
 40538                                  
 40539                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40540                                  ;
 40541                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 40542                                  ;
 40543                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 40544                                  ;
 40545                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 40546                                  ;
 40547                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40548                                  
 40549                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 40550                                  	mov	di,200h
 40551                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 40552                                  	push	cx
 40553                                  	sub	cx,dx
 40554                                  	inc	cx
 40555                                  scsagain:
 40556                                  	push	si
 40557                                  	push	di
 40558                                  	push	cx
 40559                                  	mov	cx,dx
 40560                                  	rep	cmpsb
 40561                                  	pop	cx
 40562                                  	pop	di
 40563                                  	pop	si
 40564                                  	je	short scsfound
 40565                                  	inc	di
 40566                                  	loop	scsagain
 40567                                  scsfound:
 40568                                  	pop	cx
 40569                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 40570                                  	retn
 40571                                  	
 40572                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40573                                  ;
 40574                                  ; VerifyVersion
 40575                                  ;
 40576                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 40577                                  ; from ES:2A.
 40578                                  ;
 40579                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 40580                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 40581                                  ;
 40582                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40583                                  
 40584                                  VerifyVersion:
 40585                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 40586                                  					;  in ascii
 40587                                  	mov	bl,10
 40588                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 40589                                  
 40590                                  	call	VVDigit
 40591                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40592                                  	call	VVDigit
 40593                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40594                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 40595                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40596                                  	dec	si
 40597                                  	;call	VVDigit
 40598                                  	; 18/12/2022
 40599                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 40600                                  ;vvexit:
 40601                                  	;retn
 40602                                  VVDigit:
 40603                                  	div	bl
 40604                                  	add	ah,'0'
 40605                                  	dec	si
 40606                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 40607                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 40608                                  	retn
 40609                                  
 40610                                  %endif
 40611

 40874                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 40875                                  ;
 40876                                  ; Procedure Name 	: ExePackPatch
 40877                                  ;
 40878                                  ; Inputs	 	: DS 			-> DOSDATA
 40879                                  ;			  ES:0 			-> read in image
 40880                                  ;			  ax:cx = start cs:ip of program
 40881                                  ; Output		:		
 40882                                  ;
 40883                                  ;	1. If ES <= 0fffh
 40884                                  ;	   2. if exepack signature ('RB') found
 40885                                  ;	      3. if common code to patch compares (for 3 diff. versions)
 40886                                  ;	       	 4. if rest of the code & checksum compares
 40887                                  ;	  	    5. overlay buggy code with code in 
 40888                                  ;		       doscode:str1.
 40889                                  ;		 6. endif
 40890                                  ;	      7. endif
 40891                                  ;	   8. endif
 40892                                  ;	9. endif
 40893                                  ;
 40894                                  ;
 40895                                  ; Uses			: NONE
